timelineEvents.title: Met at Work
timelineEvents.subtitle: August 13, 2010
timelineEvents.description: Our journey began at SermonSpice.com, where a chance meeting turned into a beautiful relationship.

timelineEvents.title: The Proposal
timelineEvents.subtitle: August 13, 2011
timelineEvents.description: A magical evening by the lake. With the sun setting and the mountains as our backdrop, I asked the love of my life to be mine forever.

timelineEvents.title: Our Wedding Day
timelineEvents.subtitle: September 25, 2011
timelineEvents.description: Surrounded by family and friends, we promised forever. A day filled with love, laughter, and dancing.

timelineEvents.title: Moved Into Our Costa Rica Condo
timelineEvents.subtitle: October 12, 2011
timelineEvents.description: The start of a new chapter. We turned a house into our home, one memory at a time.

timelineEvents.title: 1st Anniversary - Europe Trip
timelineEvents.subtitle: September 19, 2012
timelineEvents.description: Traveled through Europe, exploring new cultures and creating unforgettable memories together.

timelineEvents.title: 1st Home - Raisina
timelineEvents.subtitle: December 7, 2012
timelineEvents.description: Purchased our dream home in Fresno in our move back to the US.

timelineEvents.title: Adopted Chloe and Maddie
timelineEvents.subtitle: March 21, 2014
timelineEvents.description: Our family grew by two girls - Chloe and Maddie. They bring so much joy and love into our lives.

timelineEvents.title: Adopted Oliver
timelineEvents.subtitle: August 30, 2014
timelineEvents.description: Our family grew by one more - Oliver. He completes our little family and fills our home with laughter.

timelineEvents.title: Built Kaweah House
timelineEvents.subtitle: August 31, 2015
timelineEvents.description: We decided to expand to a bigger home to accommodate our growing family.

timelineEvents.title: Diagnosed with Brain Tumors
timelineEvents.subtitle: December 22, 2016
timelineEvents.description: A challenging time in our lives, but we faced it together with strength and love.

timelineEvents.title: 6th Wedding Anniversary
timelineEvents.subtitle: September 22, 2017
timelineEvents.description: Celebrating our anniversary with a weekend getaway to the coast and stayed at a castle.

timelineEvents.title: Move to Seattle
timelineEvents.subtitle: April 25, 2018
timelineEvents.description: We moved our family to Seattle for new opportunities and adventures.

timelineEvents.title: Radiation Treatment
timelineEvents.subtitle: August 19, 2018
timelineEvents.description: Completed radiation treatment successfully. A tough journey, but we came out stronger.

timelineEvents.title: 7th Wedding Anniversary
timelineEvents.subtitle: September 29, 2018
timelineEvents.description: Celebrated with a morning brunch cruise, Romanian festival in the afternoon, and comedy clutch at night.
